snippet: Natural gas, oil and propane users can expect savings because of lower prices and warmer weather, the Energy Department predicts.
abstract: Energy Dept predicts Americans will spend less on energy over winter due to relatively warmer weather and lower oil and natural gas prices.
lead_paragraph: Natural gas, oil and propane users can expect savings because of lower prices and warmer weather, the Energy Department predicts.

headline.main: Energy Department Predicts Lower Winter Fuel Bills
headline.print_headline: Energy Department Predicts Lower Fuel Bills
